channel.title: Home on AskCher
channel.description: Recent content in Home on AskCher

item.title: More than Grades: Why Self-Discipline and Focus Are Your Child's Real Superpowers
item.description: Is your child struggling to focus on homework? Discover five practical strategies from a Singapore tutor on how you can build a strong foundation of focus and self-control at home to set your child up for success in school and in life.

item.title: Smart Screens, Healthy Habits: Guiding Your Child's Digital Journey in Primary School
item.description: Discover practical strategies and the latest guidelines to help you cultivate healthy digital habits and responsible screen use for your primary school child.

item.title: Stop Forgetting What you Learn
item.description: Tired of cramming for exams only to forget everything a week later? This post explains why your brain keeps forgetting new information. Learn how to study smarter not harder.

item.title: Tips and Best Practices for Primary School Education for Your Child
item.description: Navigating Singapore’s primary school system can feel overwhelming. This post offers parents practical, no-nonsense advice to help your child thrive.
